post.body: Miss Parking Lot Attendant - is that tan car still in the lot? hee hee hee
I'd rather have a dog ;-)
OR a bocce ball set or low-end option: wiffle ball. Never know when a game will break out
OR a nice, professional grade football
not sure price point you're thinking, but the flip video cameras are fun: $107.00
Met w Aquent last wk (freelance reps).Told them I use their competition (TCG).Yet they didn't sell me on why I should use Aquent in future.
Just realized I have a schedule conflict tomorrow. Corporate management meeting OR pot luck/white elephant Stein lunch... no brainer.
At the office. trying to energize after hosting big 1st b-day bash for the twins yesterday. Alix & Deirdre had the best day ever.
Headache, why won't you go away?
Feeling very positive today. It's Friday and a beautiful day in Atlanta.
Check out my friend Ronan's blog if you're in the mood for an ad guy's rants: http://totallyfubar.blogspot.com/. Mad Men meats Bill Maher.
Great post by one of my favorite people: http://tinyurl.com/66q9u2 -
Why can't Atlanta drivers handle the rain?
Great gift for an art or history lover: "The Forger's Spell" http://tinyurl.com/5ao7fz
With all of the pre-holiday activity going on, I've completely forgotten about Twitter... how quickly we fall back to old patterns
Check out recent blog post / interview with Art Director Bo Uzzle on Stein's site: http://www.steincommunications.com/thescoop/. Bo rocks.
Okay, totally need caffeine. Why didn't I stop at Starbucks on way in. Green tea is just not cutting it.
using lunch time to plan b-day party for my two soon to be 1 year olds...any cool party ideas?
Forbes says ATL poised to make a housing comeback in 2009. Listed as one of the top U.S. 10 cities to do so.
Received RFP asking for research, brand dev, comm plan & design & printing for almst 10 pubs. Budget is 1/2 of what it would really take
Early X-mas present from hubby: 1st season of Mad Men. Second one rocked, looking forward to seeing 1st to fill in blanks
Need to pick up one more present once we reach PA. Need good book for Dad. Decided to wait to see his recent buys before getting one here
wishing I had an iphone instead of a blkberry right now
Getting ready for our drive from warm Atlanta to cold Bucks County, PA... house ready for dog sitter/check/ rented mini-van packed/check.
Our Keith Richards B-day Bash for Ovarian Cancer Research was amazing last night.If you are in ATL & missed it, next up is Bob Dylan in May.
here's the pew report: http://tinyurl.com/56zfa9
the phone I got in June 08 alrdy feel like an antique. chk out findings of the pew internet revolution report. phone plays the central role.
Hoping Stein's pres, JW made it to Chicago on time and isn't freezing. Lucky for us, he dropped off the ham for tomorrow before he left!
okay. corporate must be reading my tweets. cause now I have to leave the Stein party early to go to a corp. mgmnt. mt.
